name: Kalee 12V Ride-On Fire Truck
categoryPath: Toys/Kids' Bikes & Riding Toys/Ride On Toys

reviews.name: Kalee 12V Ride-On Fire Truck
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together. The price wasn't bad. My grandson's fav by far.
reviews.title: My grandson is 2 and he loves it.

reviews.name: Kalee 12V Ride-On Fire Truck
reviews.reviewText: Grandson was making a wish list and this was on it. Of all the things he could have picked he chose a firetruck, which is a surprise with this kid, but he loves it. Man, can he go on the thing. Really a cool vehicle. Just ask him. Even lets his brother ride with him so they are both entertained.
reviews.title: Excited boy

reviews.name: Kalee 12V Ride-On Fire Truck
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son for Christmas and he absolutely loves it I was recommended this to any child who love to pretend to be a firefighter also its easy to assemble
reviews.title: perfect for a little firefighter

reviews.name: Kalee 12V Ride-On Fire Truck
reviews.reviewText: My almost 3 year old son loved this gift. I was very disappointed in the appearance of the stickers (appliques) on the truck. They looked like my son put them on himself. Looked trashy.
reviews.title: Christmas 2014
